high_descs: Move to the wooden desk to the left of the large bedroom window
Pick up the clock on top of the left side of the desk
Carry the clock over to the opposite end of the desk where the desk lamp is
anns.task_desc: Carry a clock while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Look down, turn right, walk straight to the window, turn right when you reach the window and walk straight to the desk and look up.
Pick up the clock on the desk.
Look down, turn right, walk straight to the bed, turn right to face the cabinet, walk straight, turn left to face the bed, walk straight, when you reach the bed turn left.
Look up and turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: With a clock in hand turn the lamp on.

high_descs: go the left side of the desk
go the right side of the desk
turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: get a stamp and turn on a lamp
